mil.nga.giat.geowave.ingest

Class AbstractCommandLineDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.ingest.AbstractCommandLineDriver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractLocalFileDriver, ClearNamespaceDriver, IngestFromHdfsDriver, MultiStageCommandLineDriver

    public abstract class AbstractCommandLineDriver
extends Object
    This implements a generic command-line driven utility for discovering a set of ingest type plugins and using them to drive an ingestion process. The class is sub-classed to perform the specific ingestion required based on the operation set by the user.
